summary: Shareable single-page Promise Day greeting website with a card layout, photo arrangement (rings photo on top, two photos below), and an emoji shower animation that overlays the photos and message content.

existing_features.title: Create a public, shareable single-page website that reproduces the provided Promise Day greeting page (hero emoji, card layout, message text, signature, and the three provided photo URLs) and loads without requiring authentication.

Update the emoji shower animation so emojis render as an overlay on top of the card content (photos and message), rather than appearing behind or below it; the overlay must not block scrolling or clicks on the underlying page content.
Implement the requested photo layout: the rings photo is displayed first at the top of the card, and the remaining two photos are displayed below it side-by-side (wrapping on small screens).
Apply a coherent, romantic visual theme (color palette, typography scale, spacing, and card styling) consistent across the page, without using a blue/purple-dominant scheme.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a shareable website version of the Promise Day greeting page suitable to send to boyfriend (host/deploy-ready single page).
Adjust emoji shower so it renders over (on top of) the photos and message content rather than appearing behind/below them.
Ensure photo layout: rings photo displayed first on top; the other two photos displayed underneath in a grid.

projectName: Create shareable Promise Day single-page site with overlay emoji shower and specified photo layout
